com.betleopard.hazelcast

Class LiveBetMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.betleopard.hazelcast.LiveBetMain

  • public class LiveBetMain
extends java.lang.Object
    The main example driver class. Uses both Hazlecast IMDG and Spark to perform data storage and live analysis of in-running bets.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LiveBetMain()

      • loadHistoricalRaces

        public void loadHistoricalRaces()
                         throws java.io.IOException
